players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Alice is the mafioso. We need to vote her out now before she kills again."
You: "I don't know why Charlie is pointing fingers at me right away. Maybe he's the mafioso trying to mislead us!"
You: "Charlie, you're jumping to conclusions. If you're the detective, prove it; otherwise, you might be the one hiding something."
Charlie: "Alice is trying to sow doubt because she knows she's guilty. Diana, please consider my investigation result. We can’t afford to lose more town members."
